forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. Becoming windy during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 58F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
